title: Nadal, Laver react to Alcaraz-Sinner classic
description: Carlos Alcaraz and Jannik Sinner captured the world's attention Sunday with their incredible performance in the Roland Garros final. Both men produced jaw-dropping shotmaking and tremendous battling spirit to create a match that will be discussed for decades to come. Stars from inside and outside the tennis world shared their thoughts on social media after the match. Rafael Nadal, the 14-time Roland Garros champion, congratulated both Alcaraz and Sinner. html:
Roland Garros

McConaughey, Gasol chime in

June 08, 2025

Peter Staples/ATP Tour

Carlos Alcaraz and his family celebrate after the Spaniard's five-set victory against Jannik Sinner in the Roland Garros final. By ATP Staff

Carlos Alcaraz and Jannik Sinner captured the world's attention Sunday with their incredible performance in the Roland Garros final.

Both men produced jaw-dropping shotmaking and tremendous battling spirit to create a match that will be discussed for decades to come. Stars from inside and outside the tennis world shared their thoughts on social media after the match.

Rafael Nadal, the 14-time Roland Garros champion, congratulated both Alcaraz and Sinner.

â€” Rafa Nadal (@RafaelNadal) June 8, 2025

Still taking in that incredible menâ€™s final at Roland Garros. So happy for @carlosalcaraz - five Grand Slams at just 22! My heart goes out to Jannik Sinner, who showed real class in defeat. What a match, thank you both. Tennis is in great hands.ğŸš€

â€” Rod Laver (@rodlaver) June 8, 2025
â€” Billie Jean King (@BillieJeanKing) June 8, 2025

Insane Level ğŸ˜±ğŸ˜²ğŸ”¥ @rolandgarros

Grande Carlitos!!! Que alegrÃ­a inmensa, que merecido por no bajar los brazos, un partido casi imposible. MerecÃ­an ganar los 2.
Felicitaciones amigo @carlosalcaraz #RolandGarros https://t.co/4OtBs5ZcUZ

â€” Juan M. del Potro (@delpotrojuan) June 8, 2025

Many celebrities were also in awe of the superstars in the championship clash. From actor Matthew McConaughey to NBA legend Pau Gasol, plenty of people commended the champions.

Thank you @janniksin @carlosalcaraz for the absolute elite mano y mano competition. Wow. Congrats Carlos.

â€” Matthew McConaughey (@McConaughey) June 8, 2025

â€” Pau Gasol (@paugasol) June 8, 2025

I LOVE watching greatness!!! Tip of the cap to @carlosalcaraz @janniksin on an incredible #frenchopen2025!!!! To play at that level for over 5 hours is amazingâ€¦ Thanks for letting us watch!! #WeAreEntertained

â€” Kurt Warner (@kurt13warner) June 8, 2025

Congratulations, dear @carlosalcaraz, for your second consecutive Roland Garros title, the fifth Grand Slam, achieved in such spectacular fashion. All madridistas are happy and proud of this brilliant success achieved byÂ oneÂ ofÂ ourÂ own.
